page.title: 07HOUSING IN LANGHOLM
page.content: THE REALLY {OLD HOUSES}IN{LANGHOLM}ARE BUILT OF RIVER COBBLES BUT THEIR WALLS ARE NOW RENDERED.THE OLD TERRACED HOUSES ARE BUILT MAINLY OF GREY STONE FROM {WHITA QUARRY}.A LOT OF THE TERRACED HOUSES WERE BUILT AS UPSTAIRS/DOWNSTAIRS {FLATS}.THE RICH PEOPLE LONG AGO LIVED IN THE BIG DETACHED HOUSES UP ON THE HILLSIDE,WHICH ARE ALSO BUILT OF WHITA STONE.THERE IS A NEW BIG {COUNCIL {ESTATE }AT TOWNFOOT ,WHERE THE { {RAILWAY STATION} USED TO BE .THESE HOUSES ARE BUILT OF MODERN BRICKS,ROOFS ARE TILED AND MOST OF THE WALLS ARE PEBBLE DASHED.THERE ARE 5 BLOCKS OF 5_STOREYED FLATS, SEMI_DETATCHED HOUSES AND TERRACED BUNGALOWS.SOME ARE SPECIALLY FOR OLD PEOPLE.THERE ARE NEW PRIVATE HOUSES ON WHITA HILLSIDE OVERLOOKING THE TOWN.
